name: Classic Helicopter Corporation
about: Classic Helicopter Corp., a veteran-owned and operated flight school, is the only Part 141, Federal Aviation Administration (FAA)-regulated helicopter flight school in Washington State. Located in Seattle, Washington, the school offers a comprehensive range of FAA-approved CFR Part 141 courses. Our experienced and best-in-class pilots provide top-notch training, ensuring students receive the highest quality education. We are also certified as a Part 133 external load operator and approved for training veterans under the GI Bill and AVOTEC. At Classic Helicopter Corp., we are dedicated to producing skilled and confident helicopter pilots.
